patient_info: Nocturia,Renal potassium wasting,Hyperhidrosis,Urticaria,Hepatic steatosis,Palpitations,Hyperuricemia,Hypokalemia,Hyperchloriduria,Increased urinary potassium,Lower limb muscle weakness,Sinus tachycardia,Hypernatriuria,Elevated circulating alanine aminotransferase concentration
golden_diagnosis: Gitelman 综合征/Gitelman syndrome; GS/Gitelman syndrome/Gitelman syndrome,Gitelman 综合征/Gitelman syndrome; GS/Gitelman syndrome/Gitelman syndrome,Gitelman 综合征/Gitelman syndrome; GS/Gitelman syndrome/Gitelman syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Fabry disease
2. Primary hyperhidrosis
3. Nocturia syndrome
4. Renal potassium wasting disease
5. Hyperuricemia-induced arthropathy
6. Hepatic steatosis
7. Urticaria due to an underlying disorder
8. Palpitations due to arrhythmia or cardiomyopathy
9. Syndrome of inappropriate antidiuretic hormone (SIADH)
10. Electrolyte imbalance (hypokalemia, hypernatriuria)

Please note that these top 10 diagnoses are based on the provided patient phenotype and are meant to be a starting point for further evaluation and confirmation through appropriate tests and consultations with specialists. It is essential to consider other rare and common conditions as well while keeping in mind the patient's clinical presentation and medical history.
